page.title: 03A PAISLEY FAMILY AT HOME
page.content:
My name is Cheryl Buchanan aged 11 years and I live at 29 Dalmary Drive with my Mum, Dad and brother Murray. Our house is a three bedroomed semi-detached villa and we own a red Escort car. My Dad works as a welding engineer and my Mum works as an assistant in Barshaw Playgroup.
As a family we have times together and we also have different interests. Yesterday was a typical Saturday in our lives. We love weekends! It started with Mum rising first and going to the shop to get something for Murray's packed lunch as he is off to Largs for the day with the B.B. I rose later and switched on the T.V. to see my favourite show The Saturday Picture Show. Later it's off to the Art Class at the Museum and Mum and Dad go shopping for a vacuum cleaner.
